name: Workflowy dark minimalist
description:
Dark and minimalist style for workflowy with 3 overall goals;
- eye friendly: soft colors and contrast, does not cause eye strain in long usage.
- minimalist: clear AND expressive setup to grasp the content and the status with a single glance.
- beautiful: pleasant to look at.
additional_info:
# about
Style and colors evolved with my personal usage over a long period of time. Since I have a long screen time, I have to evolve my preferences to find the best setup for reducing eye strain and increasing clarity.
